How It Works

Four simple steps to your dream result.

1

Upload Floor Plan

Simply upload your 2D floor plan in JPG, PNG, or PDF format. Our AI recognizes the layout immediately.

2

AI Processing

Advanced algorithms convert lines and shapes into 3D walls, doors, and windows in seconds.

3

Furnish & Decorate

Drag and drop furniture from our massive 3D library to style the room to your taste.

4

Render & Export

Generate 4K renderings or export the model to other CAD software for further refinement.

AI Wall Detection

Automatically identifies walls, windows, and doors with 99% accuracy.

Real-Time Editing

Modify the generated 3D model instantly in your browser.

DWG/PDF Import

Support for professional CAD formats and hand-drawn sketches.

Cloud Rendering

High-speed cloud rendering for photorealistic outputs.
